com.preemptive.instrumentation

Class Expiry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.preemptive.instrumentation.Expiry

  • public final class Expiry
extends Object
    Implements the default behavior for Shelf Life expiration checking.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • expiryCheck

        @Deprecated
public static void expiryCheck(Token token)
        Deprecated. replaced by expiryCheck(Token, Object)
        Performs an expiration check. If the token is expired or in its warning period the default actions are taken.
        Parameters:
        token - the token that defines the application's expiration time. If null then application is considered expired.

      • expiryCheck

        public static void expiryCheck(Token token,
               Object context)
        Performs an expiration check. If the token is expired or in its warning period the default actions are taken.
        Parameters:
        token - the token that defines the application's expiration time. If null then application is considered expired.
        context - a context object that may or may not be used by a particular implementation. May be null.
